snippet: The show, at Lawrence Technological University, features sketches by more than 100 stylists who worked for the big automakers between 1946 and 1973.
abstract: Museums across America showcase classic car culture in exhibits featuring decades of automotive design.
lead_paragraph: The show, at Lawrence Technological University, features sketches by more than 100 stylists who worked for the big automakers between 1946 and 1973.

headline.main: ‘American Dreaming’ Celebrates a Heady Era of Car Design
headline.print_headline: The Creative Engines of Space-Age Car Culture
